```{r}
library(httr)
library(rvest)
doc_id <- "167IjDVQK-pWPxavzetwu4LBNr9gFM6llx_4AA1c66ek"
url <- paste0("https://docs.google.com/document/d/", doc_id, "/export?format=txt")

res <- GET(url)

if (status_code(res) == 200) {
  text <- content(res, as = "text", encoding = "UTF-8")
  # cat(text)
} else {
  stop("Failed to fetch document. Status code: ", status_code(res))
}

```

`r text`
